attributes.action: Impose whole of life sentences on people who cause death by violence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The killers of Baby P are facing a MAXIMUM sentence of 14 years (out in 7). This is unacceptable to all decent members of our society.

If a person causes the death of any human being through violence then they must be removed from society for the rest of their lives.

Whether or not they intended to murder, should not form any kind of mitigating circumstance, the end result is the same - a life has been taken due to their violence, and those responsible should pay, by being removed from society for ever.
